page.title: 10People are my business
page.content: The{Quantock Warden}usually travels by Land Rover or on foot but prefers to be on horse .Summer holidays and Sunday afternoons are his busiest time,much of which is spent{moving {cars}off the moor. This is esential as vehicles easily make {ruts}and cause{ {soil erosion}of the fragile moor.A north east wind during a dry spring together with a{careless smoker}can cause havoc.This is true for{lost dogs during lambing time.{Youngsters} ill_equipped for changeable weather while on{map reading}exercises need rescuing. Fortunately there have been few{serious accidents.}On the hills the constant problem is{rubbish} particularly plasticised bags, bottles and cans. The{Warden supervises {special events}which include rambles and sponsered walks,orienteering for schools,and long distance horse rides.
